  _   _           _      ______    _          _      
 | \ | |         | |    |  ____|  | |        (_)     
 |  \| | ___   __| | ___| |__ __ _| |__  _ __ _  ___ 
 | . ` |/ _ \ / _` |/ _ \  __/ _` | '_ \| '__| |/ __|
 | |\  | (_) | (_| |  __/ | | (_| | |_) | |  | | (__ 
 |_| \_|\___/ \__,_|\___|_|  \__,_|_.__/|_|  |_|\___|                                                                                                         
 http://nodefabric.readthedocs.org

 +--------------------------------------------------+
 | NODEFABRIC HOST IMAGES                           |
 +--------------------------------------------------+

 * nf-centos7-bare-VERSION.qcow2    disk image for KVM hypervisor or bare-metal deployments (login: centos:changeme)
 * nf-centos7-cloud-VERSION.qcow2   disk image for Openstack (KVM) deployments (cloud-init)
 * nf-centos7-VERSION.vmdk.gz       disk image for VMWare hypervisor deployments (login: centos:changeme)
 * nf-centos7-VERSION.vdi.gz        disk image for VirtualBox hypervisor deployments (login: centos:changeme)
 * nf-centos7-VERSION.vhdx.gz       disk image for Hyper-V hypervisor deployments (login: centos:changeme)
 * nf-centos7-VERSION.pvm.tgz       VM template for Parallels Desktop hypervisor deployments (login: centos:changeme)
 * nf-centos7-VERSION.ova           VM template for VirtualBox hypervisor deployments (login: centos:changeme)
 * AWS Markeplace                   https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/pp/B015WKQZOM

 | Region                    | AMI ID       |
 |---------------------------|--------------|
 | US East (N. Virginia)     | ami-1daaf778 |
 | US West (Oregon)          | ami-1045a623 |
 | US West (N. California)   | ami-ddce0d99 |
 | EU (Frankfurt)            | ami-9cd0dc81 |
 | EU (Ireland)              | ami-79635c0e |
 | Asia Pacific (Singapore)  | ami-8cdccfde |
 | Asia Pacific (Sydney)     | ami-b1afe58b |
 | Asia Pacific (Tokyo)      | ami-f0315cf0 |
 | South America (Sao Paulo) | ami-5112834c |


 For usage instructions please see: http://nodefabric.readthedocs.org
 For support please contact: info@opennodecloud.com
 
 For community support please join #nodefabric Freenode IRC channel!
